duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct independent research and development of mainstream algorithms and emerging technologies of 3D reconstruction for future products.
Partner with Games Digital Content Technology Center to guide the future of Tencent’s interactive entertainment technologies.
Have a deep understanding of 3D reconstruction algorithms, such as Nerf, Neus, PIFU, Magic3D, etc.

education_certification.credential: Minimum: MS - Computer Science, Electrical Engineering and related fields. Preferred: PhD - Computer Science, Electrical Engineering and related fields.
